name: Galaxy Heroes
description: Galaxy Heroes (GHC) was originally introduced as a community-driven token geared towards fellow superhero fans. We first launched on the Binance Smart Chain as their network to provide one of the lowest gas fees possible. Our cross-chain includes Ethereum and Cronos. Our roadmap's vision has full farm staking, gamefi, NFTs, play to earn, metaverse and movie film. Be a hero, a Galaxy Hero!
